txt.en: <rgb=#00FF00>The counterattack has been defeated. The third canyon is secure. It is safe to press on</rgb>
'The last refuge of the Rangers shall fall before my frozen blade!'
'You will be a suitable exercise. Prepare yourselves!'
'The winds of Forochel will sweep onto the shores of Evendim and freeze the lake solid!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A growl comes from the south</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: The stench of a rotting corpse flows through the canyon</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: The sabre-tooth leader approaches</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The first canyon has fallen to your control. It appears there are a few more canyons ahead before the cave.</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The second canyon has fallen to your control. The cave appears to be just beyond the third canyon.</rgb>
'Mammoth, awaken and join me in their destruction!'
<rgb=#00FF00>The third canyon has fallen to your control. The cave is just beyond it.</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>Angmar's plan has been foiled. Evendim is safe, for now.</rgb>
Angmar is attempting to use dark powers to call forth a blizzard to freeze Evendim.
'You will pay for breaking my concentration!'
'Mammoth! Awaken and destroy them!'
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Soft snoring comes from the north-west</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: The bear has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The counterattack has been defeated. The first canyon is secure. It is safe to press on</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: Several Gauredain totems erupt from the ground at the second canyon</rgb>
Take the first canyon
<rgb=#FF0000>A counterattack has been launched against the first canyon</rgb>
Take the second canyon
<rgb=#FF0000>A counterattack has been launched against the second canyon</rgb>
Take the third canyon
<rgb=#FF0000>A counterattack has been launched against the third canyon</rgb>
Defeat the Angmarim sorcerer and claim the cave
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A flash of fur to the north catches your eye</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: The Gauradan spirit-caller approaches</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: The mammoth falls to your mighty blow</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Update: A screech comes from the cave above as you attempt to touch dinner</rgb>
The warm steam from the spring below soothes your wounds.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A pack of sabre-tooths lounge to the south</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: The ice grim has fallen to your mighty blow</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A mass of blades and ice swirls to the west.</rgb>
The first canyon is ahead. To proceed forward, you must claim it.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: The drake falls to your mighty blow</rgb>
The first canyon has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
The second canyon is ahead. To proceed forward, you must claim it.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter: A roar echoes from the canyon to the north</rgb>
The second canyon has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
The third canyon is ahead. To proceed forward, you must claim it.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: The sabre-tooth leader falls to your mighty blow</rgb>
The third canyon has been cleared. The banner may be claimed for the Free Peoples
The Angmarim Sorceror is performing his ritual in the cave ahead. He must be stopped if Evendim is to be saved.
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: The Gauradan spirit-caller falls to your mighty blow</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The counterattack has been defeated. The second canyon is secure. It is safe to press on</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: The peikko falls to your mighty blow</rgb>
<rgb=#00ffff>Encounter Complete: The worm falls to your mighty blow</rgb>
The Icy Crevasse
